sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• The purpose of this game is to discover new body parts that can be used to activate a switch
• Record "more" onto the switch
• Play motivating music for 10 seconds and then pause it
• Each time the music stops, move the switch to a different body part e.g head, hand, foot etc and prompt the switch user to ask for more music
• When the switch user hits the switch, restart the music for another 10 seconds
